env.info: (hold 0) (plate 0) (at 0 1) (sort 1 couch) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 chair) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 closet) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (type 3 container) (closed 3) (sort 4 cupboard) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (type 4 container) (opened 4) (sort 5 microwave) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (closed 5) (sort 6 book) (size 6 small) (color 6 red) (sort 7 book) (size 7 small) (color 7 blue) (sort 8 book) (size 8 small) (color 8 green) (sort 9 cup) (size 9 small) (color 9 red) (sort 10 bottle) (size 10 small) (color 10 red)

test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X closet)))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X chair))) )
test.nl: The closet must not be opened. Close the door of cupboard. Put a book in microwave. Pick a book up. Put a cup in microwave. Go to the chair.
